meta.name: Chat Tweaks
meta.tagline: Various tweaks to chatting. Every feature togglable.

noReplyPing.description: When replying to messages, automatically turn off mentioning the original poster.

noReplyPingInvert.displayName: Disable Reply Mention -> Invert List Functionality
noReplyPingInvert.description: Pings will be disabled except for people in the list when enabled

noReplyPingList.displayName: Disable Reply Mention -> Disabled Ping List
noReplyPingList.description: When not empty, the user IDs in this list will have pings disabled, but pings will be enabled otherwise.

noReplyChainNag.description: Removes the extra bar of text when replying to a chain of replies over 4 messages.

appToBot.description: Revert bot tags back to saying bot

noMaskedLinkPaste.description: Prevents highlighted text from becoming a masked link when pasting a link
